1	TssA		# Promoter
2	TssAFlnk	# Promoter
3	TxFlnk		# Transcribed // both promoter and enhancer
4	Tx		# Actively transcribed
5	TxWk		# Actively transcribed
6	EnhG		# Enhancer
7	Enh		# Enhancer
8	ZNF/Rpts	# Zinc-finger protein
9	Het		# Constitutive Heterochromatin
10	TssBiv		# Bivalent
11	BivFlnk		# Bivalent
12	EnhBiv		# Bivalent
13	ReprPC		# Repressed Polycomb
14	ReprPCWk	# Repressed Polycomb
15	Quies		# Quiescent
